Notes: Motor bearings worn out, causing overheating. Replaced bearings and cleaned internal housing.
Conveyor belt slipping due to misaligned track. Realigned track and tightened rollers.
Electrical short in motor controller. Replaced faulty relay and tested circuit integrity.
Motor temperature was rising unusually. Found coolant system clogged. Flushed and refilled system.
Hydraulic pressure valve failure. Replaced safety regulator and flushed fluid lines.
Motor controller was slow to start. Rebooted PLC and reloaded firmware.
Changed overhead lightbulbs in maintenance bay. Routine check.
Motor making low whirring sound under load. Found loose mounting bolts causing vibration. Retorqued and re-tested.
